Package eu.tivian.hardware

Class TED

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.tivian.hardware.TED
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    public class TED
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    TED - video chip.
    MOS 8360
    Right now uses the Verilog version of TED from FPGATED project.
    Since:
    2019-11-06
    Author:
    Pawe≈Ç Kania
    See Also:
    TED, FPGATED Project, TED datasheet

      • ba

        public final Pin ba
        Bus available signal.
        Stops the CPU after 3 cycles if held LOW.

      • aec

        public final Pin aec
        Address enable control.
        Makes the address bus of the CPU go into HI-Z state if held LOW.
